text: The Return of the Dead Army () is a 1989 Albanian drama movie directed by Dhimitër Anagnosti and is based on the 1963 novel The General of the Dead Army by Ismail Kadare. It stars Kastriot Ahmetaj, Roza Anagnosti, Rajmonda Bulku, Vasillaq Godo, Bujar Lako, Gulielm Radoja, Liza Vorfi and Ndriçim Xhepa. == Other websites == * Category:1989 drama movies Category:Albanian movies
title: The Return of the Dead Army
